caption: A boy and a man stood in a grassy field. The man walked to the center of the field, swinging a golf club. The boy approached and helped the man clean the club. The boy picked up the golf ball from the ground and left. At the dinner table, a family chatted while holding a golf ball. At night, the boy was still practicing golf at home. His mother, holding an oil lamp, discovered him. The next morning, they gathered around the breakfast table. The woman led the boy into the town. The boy entered a house where a man stood in front of a curtain, swinging a golf club with a crowd of spectators. The man handed the golf club to the boy and let him take a swing.
